howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step2: A profile will be generated and attached to your account.
howItWorks.step3: Try generating a newsletter. The system will do some crawling, work its magic, and do its best. See if the events it finds fit you.
howItWorks.step4: If they do, great! You're all set and you'll get a new newsletter every Thu around 4 PM.
howItWorks.step5: If they don't, try fiddling with your preferences? Just remember this is not deterministic‚Äîthe events it finds won't always be the same ones. But the important ones should be there.
